data.text:
@SParnis So glad you are doing well Stephen & getting the next Vax
Your info has been reassuring throughout this pandemic
Thanks for looking after so many people & doing your best for them
Take care & stay safe & keep on telling us how it is in your ED world 😊

@SParnis I know many have suffered & some have died, & the strollout was awfully frustrating, but how fortunate are we as a country to have been able to avoid the pre-vax devastation suffered elsewhere?

@SParnis I felt very teary when I GAVE my first AZ vaccine ( to my manager who was kidney transplant recipient). Proud of every damn one I've given!! I finally felt there might be an end to this calamity.

@SParnis now we need to follow this up with our annual flue vacc as my gp said with the international  borders open they are expecting an increase in flue this year plus covid infections as its still out in the community
